mapper.sql: SELECT t11.ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.FUNCID, t1.MEMO, t1.PARAM, t1.SYSADMINFUNCID, t1.SYSADMINFUNCNAME, t1.SYSADMINID, t11.SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFSYSADMINFUNC t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFSYSADMIN t11 ON t1.SYSADMINID = t11.SYSADMINID

SELECT t11.`ADMINOBJECT`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`FUNCID`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`PARAM`, t1.`SYSADMINFUNCID`, t1.`SYSADMINFUNCNAME`, t1.`SYSADMINID`, t11.`SYSADMINNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SYSADMINFUNC` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SYSADMIN t11 ON t1.SYSADMINID = t11.SYSADMINID

SELECT t11.ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.FUNCID, t1.MEMO, t1.PARAM, t1.SYSADMINFUNCID, t1.SYSADMINFUNCNAME, t1.SYSADMINID, t11.SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SYSADMINFUNC t1 LEFT JOIN T_SYSADMIN t11 ON t1.SYSADMINID = t11.SYSADMINID

SELECT t11.ADMINOBJECT AS ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.FUNCID AS FUNCID, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PARAM AS PARAM, t1.SYSADMINFUNCID AS SYSADMINFUNCID, t1.SYSADMINFUNCNAME AS SYSADMINFUNCNAME, t1.SYSADMINID AS SYSADMINID, t11.SYSADMINNAME AS SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFSYSADMINFUNC t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFSYSADMIN t11 ON t1.SYSADMINID = t11.SYSADMINID

SELECT t11.ADMINOBJECT AS ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.FUNCID AS FUNCID, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PARAM AS PARAM, t1.SYSADMINFUNCID AS SYSADMINFUNCID, t1.SYSADMINFUNCNAME AS SYSADMINFUNCNAME, t1.SYSADMINID AS SYSADMINID, t11.SYSADMINNAME AS SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFSYSADMINFUNC t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFSYSADMIN t11 ON t1.SYSADMINID = t11.SYSADMINID

SELECT t11.[ADMINOBJECT], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[FUNCID], t1.[MEMO], t1.[PARAM], t1.[SYSADMINFUNCID], t1.[SYSADMINFUNCNAME], t1.[SYSADMINID], t11.[SYSADMINNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFSYSADMINFUNC] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFSYSADMIN t11 ON t1.SYSADMINID = t11.SYSADMINID
